languages.text: {n}Гончая. Я взираю на карту, на которой изображена резвая бронемашина Астра Милитарум, носящая это грозное имя. Преследование, погоня за правдой, жертвой, победой. Это — я, и я на верном пути.{/n}

{n}The Hound. I gaze at the card and at its depiction of the Astra Militarum armoured vehicle that bears that formidable name. The pursuit of truth, sacrifice, and victory — this is me, and I am on the right track.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Гончая. Я взираю на карту, на которой изображена резвая бронемашина Астра Милитарум, носящая это грозное имя. Преследование, погоня за правдой, жертвой, победой. Это — я, и я на верном пути.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Warhound. I gaze at the card showing the fierce Astra Militarum armoured vehicle that bears that formidable name. The pursuit of truth, sacrifice, and victory. This is me, and I am on the right track.{/n}

{n}Warhound. I gaze at the card showing the fierce Astra Militarum armoured vehicle that bears that formidable name. The pursuit of truth, sacrifice, and victory. This is me, and I am on the right track.{/n}

{n}The Hound. I gaze at the card and at its depiction of the Astra Militarum armoured vehicle that bears that formidable name. The pursuit of truth, sacrifice, and victory — this is me, and I am on the right track.{/n}

{n}The Hound. I gaze at the card and at its depiction of the Astra Militarum armoured vehicle that bears that formidable name. The pursuit of truth, sacrifice, and victory — this is me, and I am on the right track.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Hund. Ich starre auf die Karte und die Darstellung des Panzerfahrzeugs des Astra Militarum, das diesen beeindruckenden Namen trägt. Wahrheit, Opfer und Sieg – das bin ich, und ich bin auf der richtigen Spur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Hound. I gaze at the card and at its depiction of the Astra Militarum armoured vehicle that bears that formidable name. The pursuit of truth, sacrifice, and victory — this is me, and I am on the right track.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Hund. Ich starre auf die Karte und die Darstellung des Panzerfahrzeugs des Astra Militarum, das diesen beeindruckenden Namen trägt. Wahrheit, Opfer und Sieg – das bin ich, und ich bin auf der richtigen Spur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Sabueso. Observo la carta con la imagen del vehículo acorazado del Astra Militarum que le da su formidable nombre. La búsqueda de la verdad, el sacrificio y la victoria: soy yo, y voy por el buen camino.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Hound. I gaze at the card and at its depiction of the Astra Militarum armoured vehicle that bears that formidable name. The pursuit of truth, sacrifice, and victory — this is me, and I am on the right track.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El sabueso. Observo la carta con la imagen del vehículo acorazado del Astra Militarum que le da su formidable nombre. La búsqueda de la verdad, el sacrificio y la victoria: soy yo, y voy por el buen camino.{/n}

languages.text: {n}猟犬だ。カードと、その恐ろしい名を背負う帝国防衛軍の装甲車の絵を見つめる。真実の追求、生贄、勝利…これが私だ。正しい道を歩んでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Hound. I gaze at the card and at its depiction of the Astra Militarum armoured vehicle that bears that formidable name. The pursuit of truth, sacrifice, and victory — this is me, and I am on the right track.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}猟犬だ。カードと、その恐ろしい名を背負う帝国防衛軍の装甲車の絵を見つめる。真実の追求、生贄、勝利…これが私だ。正しい道を歩んでいる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}正位猎犬。我凝视着这张牌，牌上画着星界军装甲车的图案，它便是这个可怕名字的主人。这张牌代表对真理、牺牲、胜利的追求，而这便是我，我走在正确的道路上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Hound. I gaze at the card and at its depiction of the Astra Militarum armoured vehicle that bears that formidable name. The pursuit of truth, sacrifice, and victory — this is me, and I am on the right track.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}正位猎犬。我凝视着这张牌，牌上画着星界军装甲车的图案，它便是这个可怕名字的主人。这张牌代表对真理、牺牲、胜利的追求，而这便是我，我走在正确的道路上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le Molosse. J'observe la carte et sa représentation d'un véhicule blindé de l'Astra Militarum porteur de ce nom redoutable. Poursuite de la vérité, sacrifice et victoire... Elle me représente et je suis sur la bonne voie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Hound. I gaze at the card and at its depiction of the Astra Militarum armoured vehicle that bears that formidable name. The pursuit of truth, sacrifice, and victory — this is me, and I am on the right track.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Molosse. J'observe la carte et sa représentation d'un véhicule blindé de l'Astra Militarum porteur de ce nom redoutable. Poursuite de la vérité, sacrifice et victoire... Elle me représente et je suis sur la bonne voie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tazı... Gözlerimi karta ve heybetli bir isme sahip Astra Militarum zırhlı aracı tasvirine dikiyorum. Hakikat arayışı, fedakârlık ve zafer... İşte bu benim. Doğru yolda olduğum aşikâr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Hound. I gaze at the card and at its depiction of the Astra Militarum armoured vehicle that bears that formidable name. The pursuit of truth, sacrifice, and victory — this is me, and I am on the right track.{/n}
